articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A 16-year-old girl and two boys, aged 14 and 15, are in police custody after an incident on Sunday.
articles.title: Three children arrested on suspicion of murder on Isle of Sheppey

articles.description: The budget airline grounded the unnamed pilot after hotel guests reportedly complained after the incident in Cape Verde.
articles.title: EasyJet captain suspended after getting 'drunk and naked' in hotel

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: It means the 1,900 staff will get a share of the profits and a say in how the business is run.
articles.title: Entertainer founder gives toy shop chain to staff

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: His brother tells BBC News that he had lost hope he would ever be found.
articles.title: British man who perished in Antarctic glacier found 65 years later

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The proposed changes in England and Wales come after a coroner calls UK driving licensing system the "laxest in Europe".
articles.title: Over-70s face driving ban for failing eye tests

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Barrister Mark McDonald claims he has the backing of a panel of world class experts who say there is no evidence any babies were deliberately harmed. Who should we believe?
articles.title: The flaws in medical evidence on all sides of the Lucy Letby case

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The UK's seas have had their warmest first seven months of the year on average since records began.
articles.title: Record warm seas help to bring extraordinary species to UK waters

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: In the shadow of the Gaza war, violence is rising in the occupied territories as radical settlers seize land with the backing of the government.
articles.title: Jeremy Bowen: Israeli settlers intensify campaign to drive out West Bank Palestinians

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Alicia Kemp, 25, was on a working holiday in Western Australia when she hit the father-of-two.
articles.title: British woman pleads guilty to killing man while drunk on e-scooter

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Trump says homeless people must go "far" from the nation's capital, as part of his anti-crime plan, but the mayor pushes back.
articles.title: Trump demands homeless people 'immediately' move out of Washington DC
